name: 4_sst_web_app
description: web app development for RMIT's number 4

scripts.build:css: npx postcss css/template.css -o prod/css/template.css && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css prod/css/fontawesome.min.css
scripts.build:js: npx mkdirp "./prod/js" && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js prod/js && cp node_modules/vanilla-picker/dist/vanilla-picker.min.js prod/js && npm run build:index && npm run build:service-worker
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js

author: Tuyen Huynh
